page.title: 19Nursing today
page.content: {On Friday, 21st June Nurse Donnelly came to talk to 1A.Nurse Donnelly studied for three years to become an S.E.N. She works at a Psycho Geriatric Nursing Home in Oxford Road,Southport. Her working day is from 8am to 4pm, Monday to Friday.Occasionally she does shift work.She has worked in various hospitals in Liverpool and Southport, including the Southport Infirmary and the Promenade Hospital.She has worked as theatre nurse and has seen a lot of operations including amputation, cardiac and eye operations,the last of which she hates.Nurse Donnelly doesn't mind blood but she hates vomit. In her opinion,nurses are underpaid for the work they do.Nurse Donnelly says she enjoys nursing but often finds it tiring and sometimes depressing.She says the best part of nursing is seeing people get better.
